Article.ArticleTitle: Cellular and Molecular Mechanisms of Ozone Therapy: Present Knowledge and Prospective Applications.

AbstractText: As a complementary, adjuvant or palliative cure, ozone therapy has increasingly been used globally on a wide variety of diseases [...].
